title: IBM i Project Configuration
description: Configuration for an IBM i ILE project (RPG, COBOL, C, CL). This file is usually checked into a git repository and rarely changed. You may refererence variables in the `.env` file.

repository.title: Project repository.
repository.description: A link to the project repository.

objlib.title: Object library
objlib.description: Where your application will build. Maps to `&OBJLIB` in commands.

curlib.title: Build Current Library
curlib.description: The current library that should be used when building the project. Code for IBM i does not use this and will instead use the current library in the Library List settings.

includePath.title: Build Include Path
includePath.description: The include path should be used on all ILE compilers when building the project. Code for IBM i does not use this.

preUsrlibl.title: Prepended User Library
preUsrlibl.description: A list of libraries to be prepended to the library list when building the project. Code for IBM i does not use this.

postUsrlibl.title: Append User Library
postUsrlibl.description: A list of libraries to be append to the library list when building the project. Code for IBM i does not use this.

setIBMiEnvCmd.title: Append User Library
setIBMiEnvCmd.description: A list of CL commands to be executed before building the project. Code for IBM i does not use this.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: List of Actions that apply to this project. Actions may be used to compile code on the remote system.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Action. Used when running the Action.

command.title: Command
command.description: The command that will be run when executing this Action.

fileSystem.title: File System
fileSystem.description: Which file system will be used when uploading sources when the Action is run.

commandEnvironment.title: Command Environment
commandEnvironment.description: Which environment the command will run in.
